title: Fix page loading failure and update footer animation

requirements.text: Diagnose and fix the issue causing the entire page content to fail to load. Investigate React rendering errors, query failures, component mounting issues, or authentication/actor initialization problems that may be preventing the page from displaying.

quotes: Fix the entire page content failing to load

acceptanceCriteria: The page loads successfully without errors
Console shows no critical errors preventing page display
Users can view and interact with all page content

requirements.text: Update the Footer component's background animation to match the hero section's animation style. Apply the same particle/motion/vector effects system used in HeroMultiEffectsLayer to the footer background, respecting the current hero theme settings (particle effects, motion effects, vector effects) stored in the backend.

quotes: Change Footer background animation and make it like hero section

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays the same type of background animation as the hero section
Animation respects the hero theme settings (particle/motion/vector effects configuration)
Footer animation performs smoothly without impacting page performance
Animation style remains consistent with the hero section's visual treatment

constraints: Preserve existing footer functionality including editable content, quick links, and social media integration
Do not modify the HeroMultiEffectsLayer, ParticleEffectLayer, MotionEffectLayer, or VectorEffectLayer components
Maintain the current hero theme management system in HeroThemeManager
nonGoals: Changing the footer layout or content structure
Modifying hero section animations or effects
Adding new animation types beyond what exists in the hero section
Redesigning the footer styling beyond the animation update
